title: Lavished by Nature - by Crystal Marie®
description: Imagine getting rid of Dark Marks, Hyperpigmentation, Acne, Dry Skin and more with SOAP and other NATURAL Skincare Essentials?! You can with our Natural Skincare and Wellness solutions that help to RESTORE and LAVISH your skin at the same time. Your body deserves to be Lavished by Nature!
sitename: Lavished by Nature - by Crystal Marie®
cleaned_text: Lavish your body with long-lasting skin hydration and ultra moisture replenishment. NEW! Now VEGAN! This All Natural Body Butter is lightweight and absorbs easily. Now enriched with a Botanical Blend to sooth and condition your skin! The Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil and Vitamin E are rich in antioxidants that provide additional nourishment to your skin. Paraben and Preservative free. Simply the purest natural ingredients to lavish your skin.
